reviews.review: Для тех кто хочет убить несколько часов рекомендую!
yea its not bad i guess, the community kinda stinks but there are nice people

First 100 hours in this game is really fun and is actually scary , playing with your mates is a blast. After about 400 it isn't scary anymore but still is quite enjoyable to play after you understand how to use pallets and windows to your advantage. Killer is quite stressful at times but as you realize how to mind game and counter loops it's really pleasing. I do wish they would slow down with the new killers and survivors and actually remember the old ones and give them some love- same goes to the perks. 

I've raged on this game a countless amount of times but it's allowed me to meet tons of really nice people!

game is perfect but we must updated the game because 2 days before released the pirate version 5.4.2 with all DLC unlock.Please because i think the game goes for disaster please update it to play only steams players and not the fucking pirates.thanks a lot

Body blocks, animation stuns, stupid progression, in a core implausible game mechs.

If you wanna play a very strange tabletop game, then just go and play it. Don't waste your time learning how to abuse every miserable mechanics in this realtime chess.

For sure it's very fun to play DBD if you dont care about ranks, bloodpoints, levels, etc.

Game is shit, No point in trying to wiggle because there are hooks every 15 feet and no point in sabotaging them either, they respawn within 30 seconds.  Fun for 2 rounds then just get mad at how pointless it is to run away from kids with good ping, if they have bad ping you can juke / fake them out but if they have decent internet you are screwed.

Never have I hated a game so much but wanted to play it so often. Nostalgia?
Bugs are ridiculous after updates though...
Lobbies barely ever actually work out to get you a game and generally can a lot of the time take up to about 20 minutes to locate other players.

Balance it out.
And for pete's sake, please add more game modes or some variation other than 5 gens, 1 killer, 4 survivors...
Hb like 6 survivors games, 2 killers and you take it from there with your team who have "done a pretty good job so far"?

Bottom line, recommend this game. But don't blame me if you get mad and want to uninstall it everyday.
ok

i love this game. the gameplay is very unique and would be fun on both sides if the devs balanced their game properly. i put not recommended even if i like this game because the devs never listen to the playerbase. it takes them years to make balance changes that community has been begging them to do. there are so many unbalanced things on both sides whether its perks add ons or killers. they added the most terrible skill based matchmaking they somehow managed to make not skill based skill based matchmaking. if something is unfun or op it could take a month or maybe a year to be balanced you never know when they will change it. if you play killer you get bullied by people with 1000 hours because you got a couple 4k's. you play survivor you get tunneled/facecamped or have to deal with bad teammates. truly impressive how they make an original and fun concept the most boring thing with the stuff you can bring. game is only really good if you have insomnia and need help sleeping. just one match against the new anti loop killers with no counterplay or swf with meta perks and you are right off to dreamland.

I really enjoy playing this game. I like that there are lots of different options for difficulty and play style whether your playing as the killer or as a survivor. The game play is engaging and challenging. The only downside is it does take a while to load into trials. But nevertheless it is a fantastic game and well worth the money.

Terrible Ranking mechanic. u need to reach full marks for all 6 activity in order to rank up. without consider of how DBD's bad SBMM (Low player count + P1 200+ P2 1000/2=600 MMR match) and killer inability to catch pro player (No sore for unhooking). U lose rank of being the MVP  of the team(Red II 4 star 23000 sore still -1). Also this game have A lot of hacks. with extreme bad sport-man ship. I prefer have long waiting time for player that have +- 300 MMR  rather than 200+1000/2=600. Also please fix the ranking system. Give MVP more sore or something. I've been stuck at Rank 2 four stars for 7 days and. in one noon; I made my way to 4 star 7 time and make 5 times MVP in the next match but still lose rank because I did not reach max for all 6 of the activity score.

I like how thrilling and fun it is! It's fun to play as both the killer and survivor! The only thing I strongly dislike is the amount of toxicity and so called "rules" the survivors try to implement on the killer, and if they don't comply, they usually get people being extremely toxic to them. Another problem is the survivor biased gameplay. If you're a decent survivor a killer won't be able to catch you unless they tunnel or are extremely experienced. Other then that the game is fun and it's fun being chased or chasing others!

Dead by Daylight is a great game with a huge multiplayer focus. You go into a match as either a survivor or a killer in a asymmetric style and try to escape/kill before the round is over. The real fun part is builds and getting the character abilities unlocked from all the survivors and killers. This is done via rewards in bloodpoints (which are earned per match) and allow you to continue to improve every time you play.
